entry.def: A person who is combative is aggressive and eager to fight or argue.

example.ex: He conducted the meeting in his usual combative style, refusing to admit any mistakes.
example.tran: 他主持会议的时候仍旧显示出一贯的好辩作风，拒绝承认任何错误。

means.word_mean: 2. having or showing a ready disposition to fight;

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Obama has recently adopted a more combative tone.
